column2: we got talked into ordering the duck. This was a dish I didn't intend on ordering but the server said that they braise it for days/hours. I guess we couldn't say no. haha. It ended up being amazing. There were giant pieces of duck meat
column3: unlike many other places that have ducks with more skin than meat. You put it in a fluffy bun and the white sauce on the side really compliment the entire entree. It's a mix of fun and umami flavors all together.
